entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
